description: Signals that a user has indicated intent to use a specific item from their inventory, potentially targeting another entity or connection, before system-level validation.

userEntityId.description: The unique identifier of the entity (usually the player) attempting to use the item.

itemInstanceId.description: The unique identifier for the specific *instance* of the item entity being used.

itemDefinitionId.description: The identifier for the item's template or definition (e.g., 'potion_healing_lesser'). Used for system lookups (though potentially ignored by some systems).

explicitTargetEntityId.description: The unique identifier of the regular *entity* explicitly targeted (mutually exclusive with connection target). Null if no entity target.

explicitTargetConnectionEntityId.description: The unique identifier of the *connection entity* explicitly targeted (mutually exclusive with entity target). Null if no connection target.
